paramInformation.label: Remember relays state
paramInformation.description: This parameter determines the state of relays power supply failure (e.g. power outage). For auto Off and flashing modes the parameter not relevant and the relay will always remain switched Off.

options.label: Relays remain switched Off after restoring power
Restore remembered state of relays after restoring power
Restore remembered state of relays after restoring power, but for toggle switches (parameter 20/21 set to 1) set the same state as the current state of the switches

paramInformation.label: S1 input – switch type
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines as what type the device should treat the switch connected to the S1 terminal.

options.label: Momentary switch
Toggle switch (contact closed - On, contact opened - Off)
Toggle switch (device changes status when switch changes status)

paramInformation.label: S2 input – switch type
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines as what type the device should treat the switch connected to the S2 terminal.

options.label: Momentary switch
Toggle switch (contact closed - On, contact opened - Off)
Toggle switch (device changes status when switch changes status)

paramInformation.label: Inputs orientation
paramInformation.description: This parameter allows reversing operation of S1 and S2 inputs changing the wiring. Use in case of incorrect wiring.

options.label: default (S1 - 1st channel, S2 - 2nd channel)
reversed (S1 - 2nd channel, S2 - 1st channel)

paramInformation.label: Alarm configuration – duration
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines duration of alarm sequence. When time set in this parameter elapses, alarm is cancelled and relays restore normal operation, but do not recover state from before the alarm.

paramInformation.label: S1 input – scenes sent
paramInformation.description: 0 = no scenes sent, 1 = Key pressed 1 time, 2 = Key pressed 2 times, 4 = Key pressed 3 times, 8 = Key hold down and key released

paramInformation.label: S2 input – scenes sent
paramInformation.description: 0 = no scenes sent, 1 = Key pressed 1 time, 2 = Key pressed 2 times, 4 = Key pressed 3 times, 8 = Key hold down and key released

paramInformation.label: Q output - operating mode
paramInformation.description: This parameter allows to choose operating mode for channel controlled with Q output. For timed modes (value 1, 2 or 3), time is set with parameter 154 and reaction to input change is set with parameter 152.

options.label: Standard operation
Delay Off
Auto Off
Flashing

paramInformation.label: Q output - reaction to input change in delayed/auto Off modes
paramInformation.description: This parameter determines how the device reacts when changing state of S1 input in timed modes.

options.label: Cancel mode and set default state
No reaction, mode runs until it ends
Reset timer, start counting time from the beginning

paramInformation.label: Q output – time parameter for delayed/auto Off and flashing modes
paramInformation.description: This parameter allows to set time parameter used in timed modes. For delayed/auto Off modes it determines duration, for flashing mode it determines cycle period.

paramInformation.label: S1 Switch On value sent to 2nd association group
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines value sent with Switch On command to devices in 2nd association group.

paramInformation.label: S1 Switch Off value sent to 2nd association group
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines value sent with Switch Off command to devices in 2nd association group.

paramInformation.label: S1 Double Click value sent to 2nd association groups
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines value sent with Double Click command to devices in 2nd association group.

paramInformation.label: S2 Switch On value sent to 3rd association group
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines value sent with Switch On command to devices in 3rd association group.

paramInformation.label: S2 Switch Off value sent to 3rd association group
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines value sent with Switch Off command to devices in 3rd association group.

paramInformation.label: S2 Double Click value sent to 3rd association groups
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines value sent with Double Click command to devices in 3rd association group.

paramInformation.label: Q output type
paramInformation.description: This parameter determines type of Q output.

options.label: Normally Open (relay contacts opened turned Off, closed when turned On)
Normally Closed (relay contacts closed turned Off, opened when turned On)
